{"word":"beams","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(建築)梁、桁","english_definition":"a long, sturdy piece of squared timber or metal spanning an opening or part of a building, usually to support the roof or floor above.","examples":[{"sentence":"The roof is supported by heavy wooden beams.","translation":"屋根は重い木製の梁で支えられています。"},{"sentence":"Steel beams are used in the construction of skyscrapers.","translation":"鉄骨の梁は高層ビルの建設に使われています。"}],"collocations":["wooden beam (木製の梁)","steel beam (鉄骨の梁)","support beam (支え梁)","ceiling beam (天井梁)"],"synonyms":["girder","joist","rafter","lintel"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(光)光線、ビーム","english_definition":"a ray or shaft of light.","examples":[{"sentence":"The sun's beams streamed through the window.","translation":"太陽の光線が窓から差し込んだ。"},{"sentence":"A beam of light shone on the stage.","translation":"舞台に光線が当たった。"}],"collocations":["sunbeam (太陽光線)","laser beam (レーザー光線)","headlight beam (ヘッドライトの光)","searchlight beam (探照灯の光)"],"synonyms":["ray","shaft","streak","gleam","glimmer"],"antonyms":["darkness","shadow"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(光が)輝く、照りつける","english_definition":"(of light) to shine brightly.","examples":[{"sentence":"The sun beamed down on the beach.","translation":"太陽がビーチに照りつけた。"},{"sentence":"The lighthouse beacon beamed across the sea.","translation":"灯台の光が海を渡って輝いた。"}],"collocations":["sun beams (太陽が照りつける)","light beams (光が輝く)"],"synonyms":["shine","radiate","gleam","glitter","sparkle"],"antonyms":["dim","fade"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(人が)満面の笑みを浮かべる、にこにこする","english_definition":"to smile radiantly; to express happiness or pleasure through a wide, bright smile.","examples":[{"sentence":"She beamed with pride as she accepted the award.","translation":"彼女は賞を受け取るとき、誇らしげに満面の笑みを浮かべた。"},{"sentence":"He beamed at his daughter's graduation.","translation":"彼は娘の卒業式で満面の笑みを浮かべた。"}],"collocations":["beam with joy (喜びで満面の笑みを浮かべる)","beam with pride (誇らしげに満面の笑みを浮かべる)","beam at someone (～に満面の笑みを向ける)"],"synonyms":["grin","smile broadly","glow","radiate"],"antonyms":["frown","scowl"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(無線などで)発信する、送信する","english_definition":"to transmit (a radio signal, message, etc.).","examples":[{"sentence":"The radio station beams its signal across the region.","translation":"ラジオ局はその信号を地域全体に発信する。"},{"sentence":"The data was beamed to the satellite.","translation":"データは衛星に送信された。"}],"collocations":["beam a signal (信号を発信する)","beam data (データを送信する)","beam a message (メッセージを発信する)"],"synonyms":["transmit","broadcast","send","relay"],"antonyms":["receive"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古英語の「bēam」に由来し、元々は「木、立木」を意味していました。ゲルマン祖語の「*baumaz」（木）に遡り、PIE語根の「*bheu-」（存在する、成長する）に関連します。建築用語としての「梁」の意味は、木材から作られたことから派生しました。「光線」の意味は、光が「射す」様子が梁に似ていることから比喩的に用いられるようになりました。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/biːmz/","syllables":"beams (1 syllable)"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"beams","verb_forms":{"present_simple":["beams"],"past_simple":"beamed","past_participle":"beamed","present_participle":"beaming"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**beams**」は名詞と動詞の両方の用法があります。\n\n*   **名詞:**\
    *   建築における「梁」は、建物を支える重要な構造材です。\
    *   「光線」は、光が一点から放射状に広がる様子を表します。\
*   **動詞:**\
    *   光が「輝く」様子、人が「満面の笑みを浮かべる」様子、無線などで「発信する」様子を表します。\
    *   人が「満面の笑みを浮かべる」場合は、喜びや幸福感を表すことが多いです。\
    *   無線通信の文脈では、データを特定の方向に送信することを意味します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ She beamed of happiness.","correct":"✓ She beamed with happiness.","note":"「beamed with」は、感情を表す表現として一般的です。「beamed of」は通常使いません。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The sun was beaming hardly.","correct":"✓ The sun was beaming brightly.","note":"「hardly」は「ほとんど～ない」という意味なので、ここでは不適切です。「brightly」は「明るく」という意味で、光が輝く様子を表すのに適しています。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is a beam in the construction.","correct":"✓ He is using a beam in the construction.","note":"「beam」を建築資材として使う場合は、動詞「use」が必要です。「He is a beam」は文法的に誤りです。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["beaming (形容詞: 満面の笑みを浮かべた、輝く)","beamish (形容詞: 輝いている、幸福そうな - 古風な表現)"],"idioms_phrases":["on the beam (正しい方向に進んでいる、順調である)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2 (建築用語、無線通信)、B1 (光線、笑顔)","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**beams**」は、いくつかの意味を持つ単語です。一番よくあるのは、建物に使われる「梁（はり）」のことです。これは建物を支えるための太い木や金属のことです。また、「光線」という意味もあります。太陽の光が差し込む様子を「sunbeams（太陽光線）」と言ったりします。人が「beams」という動詞で使われるときは、とても嬉しそうに満面の笑みを浮かべている様子を表します。例えば、試験に合格した人が「beams with joy（喜びで満面の笑みを浮かべる）」のように使います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The old house had exposed wooden **beams**.","translation":"その古い家にはむき出しの木製の梁があった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"梁"},{"sentence":"**Beams** of sunlight filled the room.","translation":"太陽の光線が部屋を満たした。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"光線"},{"sentence":"She **beams** whenever she talks about her grandchildren.","translation":"彼女は孫の話をするときはいつも満面の笑みを浮かべる。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"満面の笑みを浮かべる"},{"sentence":"The radio station **beams** its signal across the country.","translation":"そのラジオ局は全国に信号を発信している。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"発信する"},{"sentence":"Her face was **beaming** with happiness.","translation":"彼女の顔は幸福で輝いていた。","type":"adjective (beaming)","meaning_category":"満面の笑みを浮かべた"}]}
